bibRefCitation.refString: Bayarsaikhan, U., Li, H. H., Im, K. H. & Bae, Y. S. (2020 a) Four new and three newly recorded species of Diduga Moore, [1887] (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae) from China. Zootaxa, 4751 (2), 357 - 368. https: // doi. org / 10.11646 / zootaxa. 4751.2.10

subSubSection.paragraph:
Diduga allodubatolovi Bayarsaikhan, Li & Bae, 2020
, Zootaxa 4751 (2): 360, figs. 2, 10. TL: China ( Yunnan Prov. ).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype :
1 ♂ , China , Yunnan Province , Bubang , Mengla County ,
650m
,
22.VIII.2005
, leg. Yingdang Ren , adult and gen. slide No. INU–10106 China , deposited in Nankai University , Tianjin , China .
